page.title: 07Health in Ufton and Area.
page.content: The community of Ufton and Bascote Heath have no community health facilities. If illness or injury can not be self-treated the residents have to travel to nearby Harbury village or the small town of Southam (1km. and 3km. respectively). Here they will find two 3 doctor practices. Other practices are available at Radford Semele and Royal Leamington Spa further along the A 425 road. The nearest hospital is at the town of Warwick nearly seven miles away. Most of the time the people of this area treat their own illnesses and injuries. The situation is similar in terms of veterinary services for animals.
